thread.title: Stephanie Davis shares sweet picture of baby son after Jeremy McConnell finally meets him
thread.title_full: Stephanie Davis shares sweet picture of baby son after Jeremy McConnell finally meets him - Mirror Online

author: mirror.co.uk
title: Stephanie Davis shares sweet picture of baby son after Jeremy McConnell finally meets him
text:
Stephanie Davis shares sweet picture of baby son after Jeremy McConnell finally meets him The proud mum treated fans to another look at the adorable tot   Share   Comments By Zoe Shenton Alistair McGeorge 22:34, 20 FEB 2017 Updated 23:03, 20 FEB 2017 Celebs Cute as a button: Caben-Albi   Share   Comments Get soaps   Stephanie Davis has melted hearts with another sweet picture of her newborn son Caben-Albi. 
The proud mum, 23, took to Twitter on Monday evening to show the tot off to her fans.
Caben looks as a cute as a button dressed in a grey top as he lies on a white furry teddy that his name emblazoned across it.
Former Hollyoaks actress Steph simply captioned the sweet shot with his name and a heart and elephant emoji.
Caben-Albi (Photo: stephdavis77/Twitter) Steph was clearly in a good mood over the weekend (Photo: stephdavis88/Twitter) Her post comes after Steph hinted that a lovely weekend had her set up for the week ahead - after Jeremy McConnell also got to meet the tot.
Steph remained cryptic as she shared three rosy-cheeked smiling emojis alongside a post which read: "A Sunday well spent brings a week of content."
And Jez was similarly coy with his own tweet on Friday night, but many of his followers assumed he was talking about meeting his baby.
Jeremy hinted that he's finally met his son (Photo: Rex Features) “Had an amazing few days,” he tweeted alongside a heart emoji. “Feeling blessed.”
Meanwhile, Steph and Jeremy recently started following each other on Twitter again, prompting speculation they had finally kissed and made up following months of public squabbling.
Stephanie Davis The tattooed hunk met the actress last year when they both took part in Celebrity Big Brother . 
They fell in love and continued dating on the outside world until things turned sour a few months later.
Steph soon found out she was pregnant and at the time, Jeremy said it wasn't true.
Three weeks after Steph gave birith, the 26-year-old Irish hunk appeared on This Morning to have a DNA test done in order to find out if he was the father.
